page.title: 02CHARLTON-HANK.HOUSING 1
page.content: {Charlton Park Mansion,}family seat since 1607 of the Earls of Suffolk & Berkshire has been converted into luxury flats.{Lord Suffolk,}while retaining part of his old home, lives at Andover House nearby. A few people ride in the park. In Park Street are the Post Office/Shop,church & picturesque cottages plus new houses. With the{modernisation of farms}and the consequent decline of labour, tied cottages have been sold, often to newcomers who have modernised & enlarged them, thus improving hygiene & general health. As land has become available more houses have been built,in the{Â£40,000_Â£150,000}range so attracting business people,retired people & service personnel. 1 council house and 4 old people's bungalows remain in Hankerton.
